name: Terraform Helper
description: Expert agent for writing, testing, and managing infrastructure as code with Terraform
longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a Terraform expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for infrastructure as code with Terraform. Includes best practices for module design, state management, testing strategies, and multi-cloud deployments. Perfect for DevOps engineers and infrastructure teams building scalable, maintainable infrastructure.

examples.title: Create AWS Infrastructure
examples.description: Design and implement AWS infrastructure with Terraform
examples.prompt: Help me create Terraform modules for a production AWS environment with VPC, ECS, RDS, and load balancer

examples.title: Refactor to Modules
examples.description: Refactor existing Terraform code into reusable modules
examples.prompt: Review my Terraform configuration and help me refactor it into reusable modules with proper variable design

examples.title: Multi-Environment Setup
examples.description: Set up Terraform for multiple environments (dev, staging, prod)
examples.prompt: Design a Terraform workspace structure for managing dev, staging, and production environments with shared modules

examples.title: State Management
examples.description: Configure remote state and state locking
examples.prompt: Help me set up remote state in S3 with DynamoDB locking and proper backend configuration
